function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Narratives of freedom from interference may lead to refusal of public health policies, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","Impact":"Failure to comply with public health policies can lead to increased disease spread within communities.","Mitigation":"Public health messaging and community engagement to educate and encourage compliance with health policies.","Technologies":"Public health communication tools and community engagement platforms.","People":"General population, specifically those influenced by libertarian narratives of home as a haven.","Owner":"Public health authorities and community leaders."},{"Description":"Pooling of social harms within homes may lead to increased exposure to contagious diseases and prolonged intensity of harm.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease exposure and prolonged health consequences within households.","Mitigation":"Improving housing conditions, providing resources for home-based healthcare, and promoting community support networks.","Technologies":"Home healthcare technologies, community support platforms, and home improvement tools.","People":"Household members, especially those in marginalized communities with inadequate housing conditions.","Owner":"Government agencies, nonprofit organizations, and community leaders."}]}
